description: Detects suspicious parent processes that should not have any children or should only have a single possible child program
name: Suspicious Process Parents
query: (process.parent.executable.text:(*\\minesweeper.exe OR *\\winver.exe OR *\\bitsadmin.exe) OR (process.parent.executable.text:(*\\csrss.exe OR *\\certutil.exe OR *\\eventvwr.exe OR *\\calc.exe OR *\\notepad.exe) AND (NOT ((process.executable.text:(*\\WerFault.exe OR *\\wermgr.exe OR *\\conhost.exe OR *\\mmc.exe OR *\\win32calc.exe OR *\\notepad.exe)) OR (NOT _exists_:process.executable.text)))))
author: Florian Roth
